11311.content:
In the Mushroom Kingdom, on the grounds of Peach's castle, two royal women were strolling about the garden. One of those women was none other than Princess Peach herself, easily recognizable with her long blonde hair and pink dress. Walking beside her, with brown hair and distinctive yellow dress, was the princess of the kingdom of Sarasaland, Daisy. Both had been victims of kidnapping at some point by tyrannical leaders with dreams of grandeur. Mario himself had been their savior at those times, and their mutual circumstances had brought about the beginning of their friendship. Now the two met fairly regularly, whether for some tea, a match of tennis or even for one of Mario's parties. Today's meeting had been one of leisure, just a friendly visit that led to a conversation in the royal garden.

"That tea was pretty awesome, Peach." Daisy complimented.

Peach smiled and nodded her head gently. "Thank you. I'm afraid I can't take credit for it though. Toadsworth grew and made the blend himself."

Daisy seemed impressed. "Man, Peach. Your toads are pretty rad. They're a pretty inventive bunch. They seem to be able to do everything around here."

Peach once again smiled at the compliment. "They do so much for me..."

The pink Princess suddenly stopped, seeming to remember something important. Daisy looked confused, and a little bit concerned. "Everything alright, Peach?"

"Yes," Peach muttered, clearly lost in thought. "Oh, that's right. All this talk about the toads just reminded me. My toad scientists wanted to show me some of their newest developments. They're working on altering a lot of the power up items in the kingdom."

"Hey, that sounds pretty cool!" remarked Daisy.

"You're welcome to join me, if you'd like."

Daisy would have been lying if she said she wasn't the least bit interested...
11311.title: Peach or Daisy

115121.content:
The day was coming to a close and so was the club meeting. all the girls were getting ready to leave for the day, which was the perfect time for Monika to enact her plan.

"Hey Natsuki, could you stay behind for a bit? I need to talk to you about something."

"Sure I guess, what do you want to talk about?" Natsuki responded.

"Well let's wait until Sayori and Yuri have left. I want this to be a surprise for them." Monika whispered back, making sure the other two didn't hear.

Monika and Natsuki idly chatted for a few minutes, making sure to say their goodbyes to Sayori and Yuri as they went home.

"So what do you want to talk to me about?" Natsuki enquired.
115121.title: Just another club meeting...

choices: What the... I'm... Turning blue?! I-It's not stopping!
1151212.content:
Monika held the tube of lipstick in her hand, smirking at it as it silently glitched in her grasp. She tightened her grip on it, her back to Natsuki as rolled out the stick, which had become a deep, shimmering blue. Giggling to herself, she slowly dragged the azure cosmetic along her lips, popping them quietly to even it out. It was now or never.

Turning to face her friend, Monika gave a flirtatious wink as she slowly stepped across the classroom. She didn't stop until she was right in Natsuki's face, her hot breath puffing gently against her friend's lips as they quivered in anticipation. "M-Monika... W-what is-Mmmph?!" Natsuki was cut off as Monika grabbed her, kissing her deeply.

"Shh... Shut up. Just relax and kiss with me~"

Monika blushed softly as Natsuki almost immediately crashed back into a passionate kiss, her fingers gently clawing at her lover's back. The two girls closed their eyes as they laid against the classroom floor, making out for the better part of an hour. When they finally break their kiss, Natsuki panted and gasped for air.

"Jeez, Monika... I didn't know... You were that good of a... a kisser...~"

"Yeah... Well... I never would've guessed... That you felt like that toward me... Almost makes me feel bad... About what's about to happen..."

Natsuki froze, her eyes wide with fear and confusion.

"What? Why? What's about to happen?"

141111.content:
[Warning: This story is based off of the ideas and artwork by Opik-Oort (https://www.deviantart.com/0pik-0ort) and FruitFrakker (https://www.deviantart.com/fruitfrakker). If you're interested in this, go check out their work on DeviantArt.
Also, this story contains strong language and intense violence. Viewer Discretion Advised. Anyway, on with the show!]

Roanapur.

A place where only the most dangerous criminals can thrive.

Whether it was one of the select prominent organizations such as Hotel Moscow, the Hong Kong Triad, the Colombian Cartel, to even the Mafia, or the numerous mercenaries, cutthroat, guns for hire, or any other low-life scum that do business here.

Hell, it made even the fictional Gotham City look tame in comparison.

Suffice to say, it was a criminal's paradise...provided they live long enough to make a profit.

However, things were taking a turn for the weird and perverted for a certain dual-wielding, short-tempered femme fatale from the Black Lagoon Company.

=====

"You, uh, done Revy?"

The now literally rotund gunslinger screamed in coherent rage, rocking back and forth on her stomach whilst her stumpy, conical arms and legs wiggled impotently.

To say that she was frustrated would count as an understatement, especially for those who lived long enough to know her.

"GODDAMN FUCKING FUCK ROCK, YOU SHIT-EATING SONUVABITCH!!" She snarled, baring her fangs, which was more difficult with her puffy, deep blue cheeks. "YOU DID THIS ON FUCKING PURPOSE, DIDN'T YOU?!"

Rock sighed, walking around his now berrified coworker while drawing a cigarette from his pocket. "I told you that beer could have side-effects, but you drank it anyways." He said, placing the cigarette in his mouth, then lighting it up with a lighter.

"Well I wasn't fucking expecting anything like this! Would it kill ya to be more fucking specific?" She growled, her enormous breasts jiggling in her rage, straining her already overstretched tanktop. Of course, still ranting, Revy continued, "And why the hell'd you even buy that bullshit anyways; you get your rocks off on me turning into a piece of fucking fruit?"

Rock turned away, blowing a puff of smoke.

It then dawned on the berrified gunslinger, to which she then retorted, "Jesus fucking Christ, Rock, that's why you did it? Fucking pathetic."

In response, Rock sighed again, a light blush making itself known on his cheeks as he replied, "...I didn't really think it'd work, if that makes you feel any better."

"Fuck you, Rock. You're not the one who feels like a beached whale cuz of you being a sick fuck." Revy snarled, only to soon feel Blueberry Juice beginning to dribble out from her nipples, thus staining her tanktop in the process. Still frustrated, she growled out an unamused sigh and grunted, "...And now I'm lactating juice, huh; Of fucking course."

Rock took another drag, wrapping an arm around her head and patting what used to be her shoulder as he calmly quipped, "That's it, Revy, get it all out. We'll have you good as new tomorrow."

"Yeah you fucking better." She growled, "I can't shoot people like this, now can I?"

"Yeah yeah..." He moaned, scratching his neck. In an attempt to take their minds off the subject, Rock tried to compliment Ruby's spherical physique as he began, "...You know, you do actually look-"

"If you compliment me as this ugly-ass ball of puss, I'll rip you a new asshole when I'm back to normal, you got me dipshit?" She snarled, not willing to hear what her coworker had to say regarding her spherically bloated figure.

However, Rock had been in the Black Lagoon Company for a decent amount of time to know where Revy's buttons were. "...Yeah, I got you." He said solemnly, patting her gently. A moment passed with nothing said between the two.

"...Egh, it's... not too bad once you get used to the pressure." She said, as an annoyed blush spread across her cheeks. Needing something familiar to take her mind off of things, Revy glared back at her coworker and continued, "...Still irritable as fuck, though. Rock, you got an extra cig?"

"Sure thing." He answered, taking out a cigarette and sticking it in Revy's lips. "Here, I'll light it for you." He quipped, leaning in towards her, pressing the lit end of his cigarette to her's, lighting it up in the process. From there, Revy's blush deepened, accompanied by a scowl.

"...Thanks, Rock." She said curtly.

A moment of silence passed in the night as both drew on their cigarettes, the acrid smoke of burning tobacco mixing with the sweet fragrance of Revy's juices. Rock ran his hands through her hair gently, smiling some as he did so.

"...You do smell nice like this, you know?"

"...Fuck off, Rock." Revy bluntly growled, doing her best to at least tolerate her fetish-related predicament. Several minutes of silence had passed until a large vehicle parked in front of them, which revealed it's occupants to be...
141111.title: Blackberry Lagoon

choices: The next day, Revy was back to a somewhat normal size.
They arrived at a warehouse owned by Greenback Jane.
1411112.content:
"My, my. Didn't expect it would be you, Two Hands."

A voice rang out, as a familiar individual stepped out of a luxury sedan, backed by Russian soldiers. In appearance, she wore a wine red skirt business suit, with black stockings and black high heels, along with a Russian military coat draped off her shoulders. Her long blonde hair was done up in a huge ponytail, and aside from her piercing blue eyes, the most distinct features of this woman were the scars across her face, neck, breasts, and leg.

To everyone who resides in the crinne-filled streets of Roanapur, this scarred femme fatale was none other than Balalaika, leader of the up-and-coming criminal organization known as Hotel Moscow.

As to her connections to the Lagoon Company, she frequently employs the group, mostly due to an apparent mutual respect towards the Lagoon Company leader, Dutch.

Plus, she was the last person Revy wanted to see her in her current bloated state of being, as a furiously embarrassed blush manifested upon her puffed out, deep blue cheeks, only able to muster a frustratingly flustered sentence as she hesitantly said, "...Hey, Sis."

Obviously, the Russian woman can clearly see the immobile woman's eyes refusing to look towards her, most likely in some form of personal shame on her part. Though, she certainly wouldn't admit it, for sure.

Rock, on the other hand, stood in attention before the boss of Hotel Moscow, who calmly made her way over towards the oddity that was the berrified Revy.

"Miss Balalaika..." He said in an almost absentmimded manner. Like a Bengal Tiger, Balalaika slowly circled around the humongously spherical cobalt abnormality before her and her armed entourage, with the occasional light poke or jab here and there.

Of course, such physical contact didn't sit well with the infamous "Two Hands", especially since her sense of touch was now stupidly sensitive due to becoming a giant human blueberry. Suffice to say, Revy forced her mouth shut to stifle the sexual moans bubbling it's way up her throat, which seemed almost impossible with her cheeks puffed up like this.

And yet, it wasn't until the Russian was soon standing face to face with the bloated gunslinger, clearly noting Revy's juice-lactating mammaries, just as the blueberry juice leaking from her bloated breasts had formed a small puddle around her front.

A smile slowly formed upon the woman's hardened and scarred face, obviously getting a chuckle from seeing Revy in a morbidly adorable conundrum, to which she cheekily quipped, "...Well, if I didn't know any better, I'd say you got a turn-on from all that prodding."

"Y-YOU SHUT IT!! It's not like I fucking wanted to get turned into *growl* THIS!" Revy bluntly exclaimed, flailing her stumpy, conical arms and legs in protest, which made the juice inside of her bloated form churn from the rapid violent movements, resulting in her libido spiking just a tad.

Shortly after having a good chuckle, Balalaika snapped her fingers, thus summoning her second-in-command, Boris, to her side, to which the scarred woman then calmly elaborated, "Have Ms. Lee here loaded up and ready for transport."

"Of course." The man retorted, where he then barked out an order to his subordinates in the Russian dialect, to which the soldiers then promptly approached the spherical Revy.

However, before they proceeded to roll the human blueberry, Balalaika spoke to her men and gently said, "Oh, and please be gentle with her, men. She looks to be rather...ripe, as it were."

"Yes, Capitan!"

And with that, the Russian soldiers promptly rolled the bloated gunslinger. Of course, knowing Revy, the sudden motion combined with being stuffed to the brim with berry juice didn't sit well with her, as the woman shouted, "What are you- Hey, HEY!! QUIT IT, YOU FUCKHEADS!! WHO SAID YOU IDIOTS CAN DO THIS?! *Glorp!* I said STOP, DAMMIT! I FEEL LIKE I'M GONNA PUKE JUICE SHIT OVER HERE!! ARE YOU EVEN FUCKING LISTENING, DIPSHITS!?!"

Suffice to say, Revy felt like being on a shitty Tilt-A-Whirl after eating a buffets' worth of pizza, only she's unable to use her hands to prevent herself from vomiting, while Rock watched as the members of Hotel Moscow messily loaded up Revy and secured her in place on the widened flatbed trailer via custom-made straps and vices.

After wards, Balalaika soon gazed upon Rock, whose eyes were focused on the massive blueberry that was Revy, only snapping out of such a glare when the Russian mused, "You'll owe me one for this, lover boy~"

A blush appeared on Rock's face, promptly reminding him to accompany Revy on the ride back to...wherever they're taking Revy.
1411112.title: Hotel Moscow's Curiosity

choices: From there, Revy assessed the damage Rock's fetish had on her.
Then, Benny came in to tell her they got new job to do.
14111121.content:
== 8 Hours Later... ==

Rock fell backwards onto the floor; his arms, exhausted from manhandling Revy's juice-filled bod all night, lay limply at his sides. With a groan, he struggled to his feet, whilst the sunlight shone through the nearby window.

"Let's.... call it a night..." He said, pushing up on the nightstand so he could sit on the other side of the bed.

Revy grunted, her body shivering due to the mixture of juice and sweat clinging to her now permanent indigo skin pigment, as she too struggled to stand up, hiking her distended daisy dukes up around her still-thick waist.

"Thanks, Rock. I'm still a fucking fatass. She moaned before yawning. "Still, I guess it could be worse, given how much of a complete shithead you turned out to be." She turned around, walking over to the table to collect her things, which were once drenched in unwarranted blueberry juice.

Meanwhile, Rock laid down on the bed, crossing his legs and pulling out a cigarette from the carton on the nightstand. "Don't act so high and mighty, Revy." He said with a smirk, sticking it in his mouth and lighting it up. "I know you liked it; or were all those moans just a joke?" He began undoing his juice stained shirt, snickering internally from getting a great view of the "New" Revy.

Sure, she was no longer the overripe spherical ball of a woman the night before, but there was still a decent enough amount of nectar-like blueberry juice churning about within Revy's systems to give her a more fuller figure than previously remembered. But hey, Rock simply enjoyed the new look for Two Hands.

Revy, however, chuckled darkly with her back turned to Rock as she lit up a cig of her own. "That's right, a joke." She stuck it in her mouth and took a drag. "Just like how you fucking me up with that drink was just a joke." From there, she picked up one of her signature custom Beretta 92F pistols, commonly referring them as her "Cutlasses". She pulled back the slide, chambering a round, then repeating the process with the other. "No harm done, right?" She said with a grin, spinning around with her Berettas held up in the air.

Rock's smirk vanished, his cigarette drooping as his lip quivered, "What are you getting at-"

"But you know what, Rock?" She said, methodically strutting towards him. "Maybe you're not the only one here with a fucked-up fetish, hmm?" She leaned in to him, her indigo hand pressing down against his arm, still clutching her pistol. In a quick motion, she threw her thickened leg over his and was quickly straddling him, her extra weight easily pinning him to the bed. Rock gasped at the increased pressure on his pelvis, though it was not the only involuntary response he felt.

"R-Revy!" He stuttered, squirming underneath her. "What are-"

"Maaaaybe," She said, her grin widening ever more as she pressed the barrel of her right M92 into the side of his head. "I have a fetish for putting a little extra lead in your skull."

"Y-You're joking, right?" He squealed; it was impossible to hide his discomfort now.

Revy scoffed, tilting her head. "Come now, Rock. You see how hot and bothered I get when I'm pluggin' holes in fuckers." She licked her lips, berry saliva falling onto Rock. "Standing at the precipice of death, and pushing another poor fuck over the edge; it's the greatest pleasure erotic pleasure of them all, much better than your faggy fruit shit."

"Y-You wouldn't-"

"Tell me, Rock. What makes you any different than any other dumbass gangbanger here that crosses me?" She dug the barrel deeper into his cheek. "You poison me, turn me into your bloated sex toy, and after eight hours of slapping my tits around, you think I'd just put all this behind me, right?" Suddenly she then lifted her left pistol up and fired a shot into the ceiling, and continued, "Because I'm well-known for my fucking understanding and compassion."

"R-Revy!" He said, panting. "I never-"

"Shut the fuck up and laugh, pig." She replied, grinning ear to ear. "Because remember, this is all a joke. This amused you, right? Me being a blue fat fuck tickles your funny bone, doesn't it? So I wanna hear you fucking laugh."

Breathing heavily, Rock managed a wheezing guffaw, his eyes wide and his body shivering in terror.

Revy stared Rock down for a moment before frowning. "Jesus, you're such a dipshit, Rock." She pulled the pistol away from his head.

Rock sighed in relief, only to then feel Revy lean in, pulling the cigarettes from their respective mouths before softly kissing him on the lips. Rock's cheeks flushed red from the unsolicited romantic intimacy, but he tried to maintain what little composure he had left, as some of Revy's blueberry saliva dripped into his mouth a little. After a few fleeting seconds, she slid her head across his cheek, bringing her mouth to his ear.

"But Rock," She whispered.

"Y-Yes, Revy?" Rock stammered.

"...You ever pull a fucked-up stunt like this on me again, I'll fucking smother you to death."

And just as quick, the barrel of Revy's pistol came down hard across Rock's head, thus knocking him out cold.
14111121.title: The Second Barrage

141111211.content:
"Fucking dipshit..."

That was all that Revy could impulsively mutter from her own lips, as she slowly dismounted herself from the now unconscious Rock.

However, even that was somewhat easier said than done, especially due to how stretched-out and distended her attire was now from her first go around as a bona fide human blueberry, as the indigo-skinned gunslinger had to hold up what had become of her trademark daisy dukes, with her tanktop practically dangling from her shoulders.

"*frustrated sigh* Way to trash my fucking rags, dipshit." She murmured, gazing upon herself via the vanity mirror Benny got at the junkyard. With Rock K.O'd for the time being, she might as well assess the damage.

"Blech! Thanks a fucking lot, Rock." She growled lowly, quickly noticing how much her now plump thighs subtly rubbed against one another as she walked.

From what little she could recall from last night after being loaded up on that flatbed, she was taken back to the Lagoon Company's shithole they call home. Between all the juicing and fucking, the only thing she could make out from all the sexual tension was that she was basically stuck like this for the rest of her fucking life.

Of course, her eyes soon wandered towards the second most obvious change to her aside the blue skin; her budding paunch of a belly. Gone were the hardened six-pack, as it was nowadays buried underneath a gallon or two of blueberry juice.

"Fuck. This is just fucking great." She muttered, poking her unwanted waterweight with the barrel of her Cutlass once or twice, obviously unamused with the additional liquid weight churning through her systems. "...Who the fuck's gonna take me seriously if I look like the fucking Pillsbury Doughboy's in-bred cousin?!"

And then, as if to add some crude irony to her situation, Revy soon heard the tell-tale sounds of a hungry stomach, which didn't exactly sit well with her.

Though, much to her reluctance, Revy had no alternative but to comply with her bodily urges, as she pointed the barrel of her gun at where she thought her stomach organ was located and snarled, "You better not fucking turn me into a blimp, dipshit."

And with one last glance at the unconscious Rock, she lowly growled, "...You fucking owe me for your little shitty fetish, dumbass."

== 30 Minutes Later... ==

To say that she was famished was an understatement, as Revy had downed an entire pan of pizza in one sitting. Currently, she was lounging on the couch, looking rather annoyed at how she'll possibly blimp up to being a blue fat bitch like last night.

Plus, the fact that everything she consumned now tastes like blueberries didn't help to quell the seething venom she wanted to spew about in a good long rant. Of course, life in Roanapur isn't as clean-cut, as...

1411112111.content:
Revy stirred, hearing the audible series of footsteps ascending a flight of stairs.

The doorknob clicked and clacked until it opened up to a familiar face.

She could only muster up enough to say, "...Dutch."

"Hey, Revy." He said, hauling in a series of leather bags in each hand. Despite his ebony skin, bald scalp, and deep graveled voice, Revy knew him more than long enough to know that he can be trusted.

A small smirk made itself known on her indigo skin, which was only a small welcome given her new...attributes, as it were. Heading over to her, Dutch calmly placed the duffle bags on the coffee table before them, then proceeded to sit adjacent to the chubby, blue-skinned gunslinger. His face remained as stone-faced as ever.

"...Balalaika already told me about what happened last night between you and Rock." He explained, pulling out a cig and lighting it. And yet, despite Revy's current predicament, Dutch didn't show any visible change of emotion, especially when it came to his colleagues.

"Heh. I bet Benny had a good chuckle about Rock turnin' me into a fucking blue fat ball of puss. Fuckin' dipshit." Revy grunted, kicking the side of the coffee table in mild frustration with juice-stained combat boots for a brief second or two, then letting out a frustrated huff afterwards.

Of course, being with her the longest, Dutch had a bit of a knack as to what made Revy tick, chuckling to himself briefly at the thought of Benny getting knock upside the head a little from making a remark about the gunslinger's new look.

"Hm. Yeah, I guess so." He remarked, only for a question to arise. "...How are you feeling?"

"About fuckin' what?" She asked, to which Dutch answered, "...About you and Rock hooking up. And I'm guessing your look's a result of that."

"Hmph! You're fucking right it's his fucking fault." She sneered angrily, not amused at what Dutch was implying. "...I wouldn't be like this if he didn't fuck me over like this!"

And yet, judging from the sounds of unconscious breathing in the next room, the black Vietnam vet can easily tell that Rock was still in the land of the living, as a slight but subtle twitch of his lips curved upwards on his ebony face, only for him to quip, "...Seeing as how Rock isn't singing kumbaya with Jimi Hendrix right now, I'm guessing you didn't put a cap in his skull, Two-Hands."

Much to her own surprise, Revy was now blushing a little, causing her deep cobalt cheeks to take on a violet hue, due to not being well-acquainted with affairs of romance and intimacy, which left the cold-blooded killer stammering, "C-Can it, Dutch! I-I-It's so not fuckin' like that!"

"Maybe..." He retorted, puffing out a fresh spray of smoke from the cigarette. "...Otherwise, why'd you let him turn you into a human fruit?"


"*frustrated sigh* Whatever..." She flatly huffed, crossing her blue-skinned arms against her now fatter blueberry boobs, wanting to take her mind off the subject.

And it wasn't until her curiosity got her, hook, line, and sinker.

"...What's with the bags?" Revy asked, noting the two duffle bags splayed out on the coffee table before them. Of course, Dutch responded, "Figured you were gonna ask sooner or later, Revy."

From there, as he stood up and reached out towards the pair of bags, and with a swift series of actions, Dutch unzipped the duffle bags to reveal something necessary.

"...Figured you might need some new digs." He said, pulling out what appeared to be...

14211.title: Violet Beauregarde

142111.content:
Violet didn’t know what was going to be next though she tried to not think about the strange boat ride that she and her mother had just endured or how that fat German boy had just gotten shot right up into a tube to a fate that neither Violet nor her mother Scarlett knew of. While Violet was quite amazed by all the various contraptions and gizmos around her, Scarlett was more interested in Mr. Wonka, seeing how wealthy he was she thought that this was her ticket to move up in the world. Though she did believe in her little champion and her ability to win this little contest, yet it was a good idea to have a little insurance in someone’s back pocket just-in-case their first choice doesn’t pan out,

“So Mr. Wonka, is there a Mrs. Wonka at all?” Scarlett asked, a grin on her face as she tried to make some kind of moves on the rich chocolatier,

“What…..ewww… No why would I there is so much to do” he giggled, social politeness wasn’t something that Wonka didn’t care for nor human interaction in general.

This made Scarlett just stop in her tracks, she just didn’t understand why this man could ever turn down having a night with a two-time beauty contest champion from 92’-93’. Violet couldn’t help but chuckle at the failings of her mother, their relationship was always been just both of them taking jabs at one another, this was just another iteration of that kind of love. While Scarlett tried to get Wonka ensnared on her trap, Violet didn’t even notice that she had her person who was trying to ensnare her in their beauty. Veruca didn’t know why but this blonde hussy had gotten under her skin, the girl who had everything now wanted just one thing and that thing’s name was Violet. Veruca didn’t want to be this girl’s friend nor even just acquaintance, no someone who is as spoiled and rich like Veruca wanted was one thing from Violet and that was complete and utter obedience. Violet thought was unaware of this twisted idea that was stirring inside the head of Veruca nor did she want anything apart of it if she knew about it.

“So why did you get into this kind of contest, Violet” Veruca asked trying to know the girl she had recently been infatuated with.

“It was just something that happened I wasn’t usually known for eating chocolate, but if this is a competition I’m going to win, no matter what” Violet was quite proud of her exclamation. Both hands on her hips as she jutted her chest out in pride.

Charlie couldn’t help but sigh in disbelief, how emboldened could you be real, the girl in the blue tracksuit didn’t have any shame did she? Veruca wondered if there was anything in this maze of mechanical wonders that could make it easier for her to take this girl away from the rest of the group and make Violet hers. Her father didn’t know why her daughter was know wanted this girl, not once did she think about buying people before, it didn’t matter though if it would shut her up then a plaything is what she would get. Handing over a blank cheque to the girl just to shut her up about it, he didn’t know if this was a good thing or a bad thing though if it got his daughter off his back then all the more reason to do it.

“Come around children there are quite many different things that I want to show you in the slim time we have with each other” gesturing everyone to group around him Wonka was about to unveil one of his many inventions.

Picking up what looked to be some sort of orb, perhaps a gumball or maybe a jawbreaker this candy was quite new, to say the least? Charlie and his grandfather were the only two who hinged on every word of the eccentric chocolatier’s words knowing that he may be peculiar but he was a genius when it came to his craft. Veruca saw this as an opportunity to talk with Scarlett about selling her daughter perhaps? Tugging the woman away from trying to make the moves on Wonka seemed to be easier said than done though, she was still trying to make the man her’s. There wasn’t anything that she wouldn’t do to move up in the world, Veruca hoped this meant things were looking up for her prospects.

“Wow… you don’t say, Mr. Wonka, you mean this will never go bad or lose its flavoring?” Scarlett was quite disinterested with what marvels the everlasting gobstopper as though it wasn’t entirely unknown to her the implications of such an invention, she just didn’t care.

Waving the woman over to Veruca was now much easier as Wonka went into a tirade of his creation, fixing her hair and blue tracksuit, Scarlett wondered why this prissy rich girl wanted to talk to her. Away from prying eyes and the other adults, Veruca met with Violet's mother.

with a stern "what, do you want” Scarlett wasn’t in the mood for games.

“I’ll get straight to the point then as I can see you are already short with people” Brushing her hair out of her face the little British girl with a tongue of silver begun to seduce this woman with honeyed words.

“I’ll get straight to the point then, I want your daughter as my pet, I’m willing to pay you for her” waving the blank cheque in front of Scarlett as a means to sway the decision of the woman.

“Your more horrid than I gave you credit for, Violet is my Champion, as long as she wins you can’t have her” Smugly Scarlett responded before waving goodbye to Veruca as she returned to the group.

With her plan of just buying Violet up in smokes, Veruca saw this as her chance to explore the room not knowing what she would find, anything to loosen the tight grip of Scarlett from her champion, stopping in front of quite a large machine as the little people shoved things inside it, stuff that she couldn’t tell what it was. Taking a closer look it seemed to be just various meals, from rhubarb pies to a steak dinner, things were shoved into this strange machine but to what end?

“strange machine right?” a voice asked

“yeah why are they putting some meals into it to what end?” she responded not thinking who asked her in the first place.

Shocked, to say the least, Veruca spun around quite quickly to see that Wonka and the rest of the group had caught up to her. Stepping in front of Veruca, Wonka hit a few levers and buttons to some effect. Lights and sounds came from the machine as it whirled awake, like some sort of creature it came alive to do some unknown order. Working overtime the machine shoved all manner of liquid through its many tubes to what end Veruca didn’t quite know. A metallic shaft unfolding right in front of them to produce something, looking at more closely it looked like……
142111.title: Veruca's obssession

15.content: Let's set the scope of the crossover. In an attempt to reduce the clutter of choice chapters, propose the story and two(+) series on which your story will be using.
15.title: Crossover

info.description:
This is a general blueberry inflation interactive where various women from cartoons, anime, video games, etc. become giant blueberries.

Female blueberry inflation only. Other fruit inflations can be allowed after the first blueberry inflation but always leave a choice.

F/F is allowed.

No Scat.
